General.Name: LAMDA Development S.A.
General.Description: LAMDA Development S.A., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the investment, development, and project management in commercial real estate market in Greece, Serbia, Romania, and Montenegro. Its development portfolio includes three shopping and leisure centers, including the Mall Athens and Golden Hall in Athens, as well as Mediterranean Cosmos in Thessaloniki; office complex in Greece and Romania; and Flisvos Marina in Faliro, as well as the metropolitan redevelopment of Hellinikon Airport area. The company was founded in 1977 and is based in Marousi, Greece.
